content.question: Which of the following sentences, if placed before sentence 1, would best orient the audience and provide an engaging introduction to the topic of the first paragraph?

choices.label: The process of domestication varies by species.
As any pet owner knows, dogs and cats are very different.
Domestication is the taming of an animal and then keeping it as a pet or as a farm animal.
The personalities of cat owners and dog owners are as different as the personalities of the pets they prefer.

content.answer: As any pet owner knows, dogs and cats are very different.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
